author: jgomes
msg: Fix for AMQNET-415. Throw an InvalidClientIDException if the login credentials are incorrect when using a failover protocol connection.  Added matching unit test.
Unit Test cleanup: Standardized the destination naming convention to prefix names with "TEST.".
